title: When YOU LOSE Your BRAKES!!! In the RAIN | American Truck Simulator #shorts #ats #simulator

tasks.task: Put on protective gear before handling farm equipment.
subtasks: Choose appropriate safety apparel.
Wear a helmet.
Fasten across-the-eye goggles.
Don oil-resistant gloves.
Secure pants with elastic legs.
Button up the protective coat.

tasks.task: Board a combine harvester for grain harvesting.
subtasks: Ascend onto the combine's platform.
Position self into the driver’s seat.
Operate the start lever or button.
Adjust dashboard controls to desired settings.

tasks.task: Operate a combine harvester for harvesting grain crops.
subtasks: Manipulate the收割机的前进和后退控制。
Control the header height.
Monitor the combine’s threshing efficiency.
Adjust cutterbar position for optimal grain pickup.
Tend to the grain tank level.
Use the pitch hydration system (if needed).

tasks.task: Perform daily maintenance on a combine harvester.
subtasks: Inspect tire pressure and adjust if necessary.
Check and tighten belts and tension springs.
Lubricate moving parts with appropriate oils.
Replace or clean air filters.
Inspect hydraulic systems for leaks.
Test all safety mechanisms and alarms.

tasks.task: Unload harvested grain from the combine.
subtasks: Position the combine at the unloading site.
Activate the unloading/unheader function.
Guide the grain through the auger or chute.
Manage grain flow to prevent blockages.

tasks.task: Store grain in a bin or silo.
subtasks: Drive the grain transport vehicle to the storage area.
Unload the grain from the transport.
Evaluate grain and quality before storage.
Protect grain from insects and moisture.
Monitor stored grain for spoilage.

tasks.task: Participate in the selection and placement of crops for the next planting season.
subtasks: Examine soil conditions and fertility.
Evaluate crop performance and yield data.
Consider market demands and prices.
Decide on crop varieties and rotations.
Plan the layout of fields for planting.

tasks.task: Address verbal communication during the harvest with other farm workers.
subtasks: Give instructions to field hands.
Coordinate unload schedules.
Check on grain drying processes (if applicable).

tasks.task: Record daily harvesting activities and maintenance.
subtasks: Update crop records with current yield.
Note any equipment malfunctions and repairs.
Track fuel consumption and expenses.

tasks.task: Adapt to varying weather conditions during operations.
subtasks: Modify harvesting techniques based on rain/sun.
Manage moisture levels for drying/granulation.
Plan ahead for unexpected weather changes.
